headline.main: VICHY FINDS SNAGS IN RECONSTRUCTION; Government, While Keeping Power of Decision, Is Seeking Help From Experts BARRIERS TO TAXATION State Faces Difficulty in Adding to Burdens of Agriculture and the Peasants

lead_paragraph: VICHY, June 1 -- There is no attempt to conceal the fact that the government's plan to reconstruct the national economy on a new basis offers great difficulties. That is why the central power, while reserving the sole right to make decisions, is seeking to inform itself on all questions to be settled by consulting the persons considered most competent in these matters.
